Title: Bs Quick View Plugin
Description: Mostly suitable for 'E-Shopper Bootstrap theme (Free)' and other bootstrap theme.
HomeWiki:
Bs Quick View Plugin (Free)
Mostly suitable for 'E-Shopper Bootstrap theme (Free)' and other bootstrap theme.



Quick View plugin (Free) Quick View is a free open source plugin designed by Brainstation-23 using TwitterBootstrap-3.2 for the NopCommerce community and it will be open source. See Demo Here This is a nopCommerce plugin which displays product details in popup window. It is very useful as customers don't need to navigate to product page to see every product details. Please, visit our site to get this plugin regarding to nopCommerce.
Supported Versions: nopCommerce 3.40
